value:
$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|$Fi1500|...$k$p$Fo500,0,0,0,255|$Fi500|Hngh! Guhh...$k$pWh-where... What is this place?!$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch00_36_MysteryHood_X_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Who goes there?! Show yourself!$k$pWhere am I?! ...ANSWER ME!$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch00_36_MysteryHood_X_Normal,Face|Hm. Another failure. I truly thought
I had it figured out this time...$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|You... What are you talking about?
Who are you?$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch00_36_MysteryHood_X_Normal,Face|Oh well. Nothing to be done about it,
I suppose. Shame for my work to go
to waste, but...a mistake is a mistake.$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Wh-what are— Stay back, you!$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch00_36_MysteryHood_X_Normal,Face|Ah... It even turns its blade on me.
No better than the others. Well...no
reason to waste time.$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Grah! ...Curse you! Hah!$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch00_36_MysteryHood_X_Normal,Face|Oh! And it escaped... Ah well.
Death lies just as surely out
there as it does here.$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|$Fi1500|...Guh! Hufhh... Whew...$k$pWhere...am I? Devastation in all
directions, as far as the eye can
see. What could cause such ruin?$k$pWhat war could be so terri— Ngah!$k$pRrgh... My head...$k$p$Sbs150|$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Blast!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Alfonse! Is everything all right?!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Things are fine for the moment, but...
where is $Nu?!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Here, safe and sound. Now...who's
our enemy here? And how did they
suddenly get so close to Askr?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|I don't know yet... Our scouts said
it was like the enemy just appeared
on our borders...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|What? How could a whole company
of troops appear from nowhere
as if by magic?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|...As if by magic...$k$pNo... Surely it's not possible...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|Do you have any idea, Alfonse?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Wait—there! That's their commander!$k$pIf we can take out the officer,
that should resolve the situation
for now. Let's go!$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Anger|...$k$pPrince Alfonse of Askr...$k$pAnd that would make you the
summoner $Nu.$k$pAllow me to introduce myself.
I am Reginn, the sister of Fáfnir,
King of Niðavellir.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Niðavellir. Just as I thought.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Anger|My purpose here is twofold. I am to
occupy this kingdom and secure the
summoner for Niðavellir.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|You what? Wh-what do you want
with $Nu?!$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Cool|I don't need to explain myself to you.
If you do not meet my demands, I will
just have to make you!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Guh... You're pretty strong.
I'll retreat, for now!$k$p

$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|They're gone. We're safe now.$k$p$EFace|So, Alfonse...$k$pThis Niðavellir... It's the home of the
dvergar, isn't it? Is it that Niðavellir?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|So it would seem. The same dvergar
who have unlocked the secrets
of magic—the secrets of seiðjárn.$k$pWith such power at their disposal,
it is likely the dvergar could approach
our borders completely undetected.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|...Ced's Yarn? What is that?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|...Seiðjárn. A systematic study and
application of magic. Only Niðavellir
has had any success with its use.$k$p$EFace_Pain2|...I let my guard down. I was aware
of reports noting suspicious activity
in Niðavellir of late.$k$p$EFace_Anger|Regardless, we must not hold back.
Not until they retreat completely.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Then we have to defeat the princess,
don't we? Reginn, I mean.$k$pShe looks no older than I am...
That doesn't make this any easier.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Tell me, did you notice her hesitate
at all, $Nu?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Oh! Maybe we can persuade
her to retreat somehow!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|We shouldn't rule out the
possibility yet.$k$pI was wondering if Princess Reginn
was holding back... It may have been
a momentary lapse on her part.$k$pIn any case, let's keep our eyes open.$k$p$EFace_Smile|And we know who she's targeting,
so we know who to protect. No need
to worry, $Nu.$k$p$Sbs150|
